ResearchGate is the professional network for scientists. The network was founded in 2008 by the physicians Dr. Ijad Madisch and Dr. SÃ¶ren Hofmayer along with computer specialist Horst Fickenscher. Nine years later, 13 million researchers and scientists connect on ResearchGate, and make research open to all. The company has completed four rounds of financing, and investors include Benchmark, Founders Fund, Wellcome Trust, Goldman Sachs Investment Partners, and Bill Gates.
